name: Isaac the Adventurer
description:
Isaac the Adventurer is an action filled plat-former that is packed with traps, puzzles and deadly enemies. Explore the dangerous world and get rewarded with ancient treasures. If you go on this adventure we can not promise you that you will come back alive, and if you will, you won’t be a small boy anymore. You will become a man!

Key Features
  • Fast paced platforming
  • Collect coins and diamonds to improve your score
  • Slow objects in time in order to solve puzzles
  • Short but very addictive levels that will provide a constant challenge
  • Destructible environments
